definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: The results showed that the cathode pastes obtained can be satisfied with the request of user.
sentences.chinese: 经用户对阴极糊的实际使用，效果良好。

sentences.english: The higher the anode is humidified , the more water will migrate from anode to cathode.
sentences.chinese: 阳极增湿程度越大，由阳极向阴极迁移的水量越多。

sentences.english: Change the Zink block of cathodic Protection.
The magnetic field is in a direction perpendicular to electric field of the cathode sheath.
sentences.chinese: 磁场垂直于阴极鞘层中电场的方问。

sentences.english: The methods of how to use additive reasonably and improve the quality of cathode coppers are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 重点论述了合理使用添加剂，提高阴极铜质量的方法。

sentences.english: The IDC has a more uniform work function distribution than an oxide cathode.
sentences.chinese: 氧化物阴极的逸出功分布比钡钨阴极更不均匀。

sentences.english: The IDC has a more uniform work function distribution than an oxide cathode.
sentences.chinese: 氧化物阴极的逸出功分布比钡钨阴极更不均匀。

sentences.english: A study was made of the effect of cathode material and various operating conditions on the elec- troboc reduchon of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 研究了阴极材料及工艺条件对葡萄糖电解还原的影响。

sentences.english: Principle and practice for application of extractive technology in extracting gold from copper anode slime are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍萃取技术在铜阴极泥提金中的应用原理和实践。

sentences.english: Three dispatchers were scanning cathode ray tube displays for information.
sentences.chinese: 三名调度员正在研究阴极射线管所显示的情报。

sentences.english: The influence of the outgassing of the material in vacuum on the cathode lifetime is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了材料的真空放气特性对阴极寿命的影响。

sentences.english: Then, fill the tube with your choice of explosive.
sentences.chinese: 然后，用你选的爆炸物把阴极管灌满。

sentences.english: Thereinto, the carbon saturated iron melt was used as anode and liquid silver as cathode.
sentences.chinese: 其中碳饱和铁液作阳极，渣中的银液作阴极。

sentences.english: In vacuum deposition, using of the cold cathode ion source can reduce the deposition period.
sentences.chinese: 论述了冷阴极离子源及其在真空镀膜中的应用。

sentences.english: A chemical substance that prevents or slows a cathodic or reduction reaction.
sentences.chinese: 一种阻止或减缓阴极反应的化学物质。

sentences.english: The peak value position shifting technology for spectral response of multialkali photocathodes is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了多碱光电阴极光谱响应峰值位置移动技术。

definition: the two poles/the north and south poles/both ends of sth/electric or magnetic poles
